name: CL031A - Pre-Pour Checklist - Location:
1 - Preliminary Checks
1.1 - Confirm current drawings being used (Drawings to be listed)
1.2 - Surveyor set out slab/concrete area and locations of cast in items etc. Pre-pour survey conformance completed and provided to Fulton Hogan.
1.3 - Existing slab faces checked:
— Must be cleaned of any loose material
— If required, patched & smooth
2 - Check formwork secured & constructed correctly
2.1 - Check no debris/rubbish in formwork. All cleaned.
2.2 - No movement in forms. Top end of form does not vary 3mm in 3m.
3 - Check reinforcement placed as shown on the drawings
3.1 - Check bar spacing
3.2 - Check cover – Refer to Drawing Spec
3.3 - Check no debris/dirt on reinforcement or in pour area.  All cleaned.
3.4 - Lap lengths as per specifications.
3.5 - Check Block Outs are installed (if required)
4 - Cast in items
4.1 - Dowels installed as per drawings.
4.2 - Conduits and other cast in items in place
4.3 - Confirm starter bars are in correct locations (if required)
5 - Joints (if applicable)
5.1 - Expansion joints in correct position, 20mm compressible material in place
5.2 - Dowel Cradles set out and secured.
6 - Check Pour Area
6.1 - Check base of bond breaking layer is not damaged, any areas missing to be rectified. Check area is clean from debris.
6.2 - Ensure broom condition is sufficient for use i.e. bristles are free from deleterious material and not clumped together.
Checklist completed
Checklist completed:
Date:
Signed:
